hero.title: Natural wellness and energy in one bottle
hero.subtitle: Rich in probiotics, vitamins, and minerals – it empowers you and nourishes your body!

about.title: ABOUT US
about.subtitle: Henka is a Georgian brand that crafts premium-quality kombucha and functional waters. Our natural and delicious products support immune health, restore energy, and maintain balance. Kombucha is rich in probiotics, while functional water provides vitamin D for overall well-being.

reason.liverFunction: Strengthens the liver and its function
reason.heart: Strengthens the heart and blood vessels

vitamin.title: The first functional water with Vitamin D by Henka
vitamin.description: Henka's functional water contains Vitamin D3, which helps the body reach its required dose and strengthens your health. Its daily consumption supports the immune system. Henka offers cherry and lemon & lime flavors, making healthy hydration even lighter and more enjoyable.

vitaminTags.title: Vitamin D for your everyday life
vitaminTags.contains: Contains a high amount of Vitamin D
